alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:30PM MDT until March 25 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches valley floors, locally up to 8 inches benches and portions of the Cache Valley. Accumulations may be lower in Utah Valley from Lehi to Provo. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Friday morning near and behind the cold front. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Utah Valley and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. The Friday morning commute will be impacted, primarily north of Salt Lake City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow accumulations are possible in lake effect snow south and east of the Great Salt Lake. This may result in locally higher snow totals in these areas over the current forecast.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
